sentences.en: Fans may undergo body searches by security guards.
sentences.cn: 球迷可能要接受保安人员的搜身检查。

sentences.en: He has been released from prison to undergo medical treatment in the United States.
sentences.cn: 他获释出狱去美国接受治疗。

sentences.en: He has to have an operation to undergo at once.
In adults, fibroblasts in connective tissue rarely undergo division.
sentences.cn: 成年人结缔组织的成纤维细胞很少发生分裂.

sentences.en: Ketenes, notably dimethyl ketene, readily undergo oligomerization and polymerization.
sentences.cn: 烯酮, 特别是二甲基烯酮, 很容易齐聚和聚合.

sentences.en: Most ovarian follicles undergo an involutional process called follicular atresia.
sentences.cn: 大多数卵泡都经过退化变为闭锁卵泡.

sentences.en: She has been undergoing tests since Monday.
sentences.cn: 她从星期一开始一直在接受各种检查。

sentences.en: Some of the excited atoms undergo radiative deexcitation.
sentences.cn: 某些受激的原子会发生辐射性退激.

sentences.en: Some stars do undergo changes, such stars are called variables.
sentences.cn: 有些星经历着真正的变化, 这种星叫做变星.

sentences.en: Teachers should be expected to undergo mid-career training and development.
sentences.cn: 教师应该参加中期职业培训和发展活动。

sentences.en: The country has undergone massive changes recently.
sentences.cn: 这个国家最近经历了巨大的变化。

sentences.en: The explorers had to undergo much suffering.
sentences.cn: 探险者不得不忍受很多困苦.

sentences.en: The idea must undergo the checkout of experiment.
sentences.cn: 观念必须经得起实验的检验。

sentences.en: The planes have to undergo rigorous safety checks.
sentences.cn: 飞机必须经过严密的安全检查.

sentences.en: The residual nucleus will, in general, undergo a radioactive transformation.
sentences.cn: 剩余核一般说来将发生一次放射性衰变.

sentences.en: The sensory system may also undergo long - term adaptation in alien environments.
sentences.cn: 感觉系统对陌生的环境可能经过长时期才能适应.

sentences.en: The sensory system may undergo long-term adaptation in alien environments.
sentences.cn: 感觉系统对陌生的环境可能经过长时期才能适应。

sentences.en: The two particles will undergo accelerations as a result of their interaction.
sentences.cn: 这两个粒子由于相互作用将获得加速度.

trans.tran_en: if you undergo a change, an unpleasant experience etc, it happens to you or is done to you

trans.tran_cn: 经历， 经受， 遭受
